items.sentence: I didn\'t think Tom would be interested in doing that.
I didn\'t think Tom would be so determined to do that.
It\'ll be cheaper in the long run to use real leather.
We have some guys on our team who can\'t speak French.
Tom grew to love the stray dog that followed him home.
Tom has to go shopping with his mother this afternoon.
Tom slept on two chairs that had been pushed together.
Tom suspected that Mary was the one who had done that.
Tom threw his line in and waited for the fish to bite.
Tom doesn\'t get along with most people in the office.
